description.title: Visibility Config: transparent contract, all events are public with a guessing game
description.purpose:
Use a simple guessing game, with VisibilityConfig.isTransparent set to true. This opens up calls to get_storage_at, and additionally makes all events public. In this test two gateways are used, the first by a dev user that deploys the contract and the second by a player of the game. The dev user has a subscriber to the events, and should be able to see the events even though they contain an EOA which does not belong to them.
Skipped due to https://github.com/ten-protocol/ten-internal/issues/3933 (may be related)
